recommendations.title: Fix Symbol Recognition System
recommendations.description: The IntelligentResponse service is not properly extracting symbols from queries, defaulting to AAPL for all requests.
steps: Review symbol extraction logic in intelligentResponse.js
Test regex patterns for different asset types
Add symbol validation and error handling
Verify market data service symbol mapping

recommendations.title: Restore Portfolio-Chat Integration
recommendations.description: Portfolio data is uploaded successfully but not accessible during chat analysis.
steps: Check session management between upload and chat endpoints
Verify portfolio data persistence in session storage
Add portfolio context to analysis queries

recommendations.title: Enhance Response Quality
recommendations.description: Add explanatory content and reduce generic responses.
steps: Add market context to price movements

recommendations.title: Complete Test Coverage
recommendations.description: Add missing test categories for full validation.
